login.title: Login

food.title: Food & Nutrition
food.description: Manage your daily nutrition and track your nutritional goals
food.comingSoonDescription: We're developing a complete nutritional tracking tool with a comprehensive food database.

features.searchDescription: Complete database with Brazilian and international foods
features.calculatorDescription: Automatically calculate calories, macros and micronutrients
features.favoritesDescription: Save your most consumed foods for quick access
features.trackingDescription: Log your meals and monitor your nutritional progress

supplements.title: Supplements
supplements.description: Organize your supplements and optimize your supplementation
supplements.comingSoonDescription: Complete supplement management system with reminders and personalized recommendations.

features.proteinDescription: Whey, casein, creatine and other performance supplements
features.preworkoutDescription: Caffeine, beta-alanine and compounds for energy and focus
features.vitaminsDescription: Vitamin complexes, omega-3, vitamin D and other essentials
features.scheduleDescription: Smart reminders based on your workouts and goals

profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.aiTrainerInfo: AI-powered personal trainer that creates personalized plans, tracks your progress, and automatically adjusts your workouts.
profile.connectWithPros: Connect with personal trainers and nutritionists

measurements.title: Body Measurements
measurements.description: The more measurement data we have, the more accurate our calculations and personalized recommendations will be for you.

neck.label: Neck
neck.description: Neck circumference at the narrowest part

back.label: Back
back.description: Back width from shoulder to shoulder

forearm.label: Forearm
forearm.description: Forearm circumference at the widest part

waist.label: Waist
waist.description: Waist circumference at the narrowest part

hip.label: Hip
hip.description: Hip circumference at the widest part

thigh.label: Thigh
thigh.description: Thigh circumference at the widest part

calf.label: Calf
calf.description: Calf circumference at the widest part

foot.label: Foot
foot.description: Foot length from big toe to heel

validation.heightInvalid: Height must be a valid number
validation.heightMin: Height must be at least 100 cm
validation.heightMax: Height must be at most 250 cm

validation.weightMax: Weight must be at most 300 kg
validation.neckInvalid: Neck measurement must be a valid number

validation.neckMax: Neck measurement must be at most 60 cm

validation.backMax: Back measurement must be at most 150 cm
validation.bicepsInvalid: Biceps measurement must be a valid number
validation.bicepsMin: Biceps measurement must be at least 20 cm
validation.bicepsMax: Biceps measurement must be at most 60 cm

validation.forearmMax: Forearm measurement must be at most 40 cm
validation.wristInvalid: Wrist measurement must be a valid number

validation.wristMax: Wrist measurement must be at most 25 cm
validation.chestInvalid: Chest measurement must be a valid number
validation.chestMin: Chest measurement must be at least 60 cm
validation.chestMax: Chest measurement must be at most 150 cm
validation.abdomenInvalid: Abdomen measurement must be a valid number
validation.abdomenMin: Abdomen measurement must be at least 50 cm
validation.abdomenMax: Abdomen measurement must be at most 150 cm
validation.waistInvalid: Waist measurement must be a valid number
validation.waistMin: Waist measurement must be at least 50 cm
validation.waistMax: Waist measurement must be at most 130 cm
validation.hipInvalid: Hip measurement must be a valid number
validation.hipMin: Hip measurement must be at least 60 cm
validation.hipMax: Hip measurement must be at most 150 cm
validation.thighInvalid: Thigh measurement must be a valid number
validation.thighMin: Thigh measurement must be at least 35 cm
validation.thighMax: Thigh measurement must be at most 80 cm
validation.calfInvalid: Calf measurement must be a valid number
validation.calfMin: Calf measurement must be at least 25 cm
validation.calfMax: Calf measurement must be at most 50 cm
validation.footInvalid: Foot measurement must be a valid number

validation.footMax: Foot measurement must be at most 35 cm

help.title: Help & Support
help.supportDescription: Need help? Our support team is ready to assist you.
help.emailBody:
Hello,

I need help with the MyCycle app.

Please describe your issue or question below:

about.title: About MyCycle
about.appDescription: MyCycle is developed in partnership with expert personal trainers, ensuring all calculations and recommendations are based on science and evidence.
about.partnershipsDesc: Developed in collaboration with certified personal trainers and fitness experts.

medical.bodyFatYMCARef: YMCA Fitness Testing and Assessment Manual
medical.bodyFatDeurenbergRef: Deurenberg et al. (1991) - International Journal of Obesity
medical.mifflinRef: Mifflin et al. (1990) - American Journal of Clinical Nutrition
medical.tdeeDescription: Based on Institute of Medicine activity factors
medical.tdeeReference: Dietary Reference Intakes for Energy - National Academy Press

workouts.title: Your Workouts
workouts.description: Track your progress and achieve your goals

weight.weightInvalid: Weight must be a valid number

workouts.noWorkoutsDescription: You haven't created any workout plans yet. Start by creating your first custom workout or use our AI tool.
workouts.aiFeaturePremium: AI creation available only for Premium users
workouts.personalizedPlans: Personalized plans based on your profile
workouts.customPlanDescription: Choose from over 500 always-updated exercises to create your personalized plan. Have full control over each exercise, sets and repetitions.
workouts.aiPlanDescription: Our AI works with your personal data to create a fully personalized plan, like an exclusive personal trainer. Intelligent analysis of your profile and goals.
workouts.noExercisesTodayDescription: You have no exercises scheduled for today. Check your training plan.
workouts.noVideoAvailable: Video not available for this exercise
workouts.noTrainingPlansDescription: You don't have any training plans created yet
workouts.deletePlanConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this training plan?
workouts.needAtLeastOnePlan: You need to have at least one active training plan
workouts.deleteWorkoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this workout?
workouts.workoutInfoDescription: Give your workout a name and description
workouts.workoutDescriptionPlaceholder: Ex: Complete workout to do 3x a week

premium.upgradeDescription: Unlock all advanced features and get access to our personalized AI.
premium.termsAndConditions: By upgrading, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
